name: Trappola
description:
- Trappola is a Deck of Playing cards in your pocket. Anywhere with you, anytime you feel it, inside your beloved iPhone. You can play unlimited kinds of card games as if you really had a real deck with you. It supports multiplayer with your friends over the Internet hearing them speaking with voice chat, or over Bluetooth when you are all together.

- It is a game of cards that contains all games of cards!

- You can do everything as if you have a real deck on a table. You can flip cards, deal them to you, move them on the table, sort the cards in your hand, shuffle decks, throw cards away, give cards to others, create decks with cards, put cards in decks, all sorts of stuff. And all of that with just 3 gestures: double tap, long press, tap and long press.

- You can choose your favorite deck among many choices, independent of what decks the other players use.
